significance.text: The Jakarta Post is a daily English language newspaper in Indonesia. The paper is owned by PT Bina Media Tenggara, and the head office is in the nation's capital, Jakarta. The Jakarta Post was started as a collaboration between four Indonesian media under the urging of Information Minister Ali Murtopo and politician Jusuf Wanandi. arguments.title: Ms. Qu's Leadership at Singapore Weightlifting Federation

claim.text: She has been a keynote speaker at international fitness summits, professional sports forums, and top athletic institutions, actively advancing the understanding and application of posture optimization among athletes and coaches globally.
